special_notes: State does not use letter 'O', only number '0'

Full rules: Wyoming does not user the letter O in the regisgration. Uses a 2 digit county code. If a single digit is seen to the left of the hourse icon, add a zero to the front. Key all verticals and letters as seen. Do not key diagonals.

stacked_character_rules.notes: Extracted from 0 plate types with character modifications
